IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: BRIDGEHAVEN PROVIDES THE HIGHEST QUALITY COMMUNITY BASED PSYCHIATRIC REHABILITATION AND RECOVERY SERVICES, EDUCATION, AND SUPPORT TO THOSE TOUCHED BY MENTAL ILLNESS.
IRS990.MissionDesc: BRIDGEHAVEN PROVIDES HOPE AND RECOVERY THROUGH INNOVATIVE, COMPREHENSIVE, COMMUNITY-BASED MENTAL HEALTH SERVICES TO ADULTS LIVING WITH MENTAL ILLNESS.
IRS990.Desc: THE ORGANIZATION PROVIDED 94,152 HOURS OF PSYCHIATRIC REHABILITATION AND RECOVERY SERVICES TO 502 ADULTS WITH SEVERE AND PERSISTENT MENTAL ILLNESS.

FundraisingEventInformationGrp.Event2Nm: ART AS A PART OF HEALING

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE 990 IS REVIEWED BY THE FINANCE COMMITTEE AND PROVIDED TO THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS BEFORE IT IS FILED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: WE HAVE A WRITTEN CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY THAT REQUIRES OUR OFFICERS, DIRECTORS, AND EMPLOYEES TO ANNUALLY DISCLOSE POTENTIAL CONFLICTS OF THEM AND THEIR FAMILY MEMBERS ON A QUESTIONNAIRE DISTRIBUTED BY OUR OFFICE MANAGER. THE OFFICE MANAGER ENSURES THAT ALL QUESTIONNAIRES ARE COMPLETED AND SUBMITS THEM TO THE DIRECTOR OF FINANCE/ADMINISTRATION FOR REVIEW. THE DIRECTOR OF FINANCE/ADMINISTRATION NOTIFIES THE PRESIDENT/CEO AND SUBMITS TO THE BOARD FOR REVIEW ANY QUESTIONNAIRES THAT DISCLOSE ACTUAL OR POTENTIAL CONFLICTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: BRIDGEHAVEN DETERMINES COMPENSATION FOR THE CEO IN THE SAME MANNER AS ALL OTHER STAFF. THERE IS AN ESTABLISHED SALARY SCALE THAT IS REVIEWED ANNUALLY BY THE PERSONNEL COMMITTEE AND COMPARED TO THOSE OF COMPARABLE NON-PROFIT LOCAL HUMAN SERVICE AGENCIES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST. AN ANNUAL REPORT IS POSTED ON THE AGENCY WEBSITE THAT INCLUDES YEAR-END FINANCIAL STATEMENT INFORMATION.
THE FINANCE COMMITTEE OVERSEES THE AUDIT AND THE SELECTION OF THE INDEPENDENT ACCOUNTANT AND THE PROCESS HAS NOT CHANGED FROM PRIOR YEARS.
